chapter.title: Packaging and deploying your documentation

abstract.para:
This chapter covers the following topics:
Creating TAR archives with all source files, including graphics
Generating distributable HTML archives
Generating page, desktop or document files to integrate your documentation in KDE and GNOME desktop environments

chapter.para: For distributing your output formats in a convenient way, &dapsacr; can automatically create TAR archives of the XML sources (including graphics) and various output formats. &dapsacr; uses bz2 for high compression of the archives and keeps the directory structure when generating the TAR archives.

Create source packages, HTML or PDF TAR archives with the daps package-* commands. By adding the respective options, you can additionally create page files, document files or desktop files for GNOME or KDE desktop environments.
